page.title: 02THE ISLINGTON COMMUNITY PLAY
page.content: Based on Islington Green School this project was planned to operate in two stages.Phase one led up to the production of the community play,"All Change at the Angel",and involved four months of planning,publicity involvement of local people,local research,script writing and devising and regular wokshops ranging from acting through to writing and cartoon drawing.This was followed by two months of intensive rehersals and production preparation involving a full-time proffesional team of 9,with a cast of 175,a band of 41 and over 50 others in backstage and supporting activities.The play was based on library research and on the stories and memories of local residents.Through a fictional storyline it explored the relationsip between the borough of Islington and the City of London and
